name: Digit Smash
description:
"Digit Smash is absurdly difficult, and yet I’ve played it until my tapping finger hurt" - Gamezebo

"great for casual quick gameplay whenever you want an escape" - AppPicker

-------------------------------

Welcome to the fast paced, finger flipping, mind mashing, addictive world of Digit Smash.

Frantically race against the clock and try to match numbers and symbols as fast as is humanly possible.

Choose between easy, normal and expert modes.

Connect via Facebook to see your friends scores, and even challenge friends.

Themes give you the ability to customize your experience.

Complete over 600 challenges, each one more exciting than the last.

Download today and see why everyone is talking about Digit Smash!
